name: a Hero Quest!
description:
Arrow keys to move

Mouse Left click to attack

E to talk

There is a quest system in the game but you will never see it , it's soooo goooood! Press J to see the journal that's completly empty!

Have absolutely no fun playing the game ! ;)

Best game ever

Cheers

Developpers: NeaX, Zetex

Audio: Red Bamboo leaf

2D arts animator: SamSam
